description_for_human: Gives ChatGPT access to browsing the web
description_for_model: Use this plugin to fetch information from the web to answer user's questions. Every time, you must use the plugin at least 3 times in a row. First, use generalGoogleSearches to find domains of interest, then you must run googleSearchesOnSpecificSites on these domains, and only after that you can use getContentsOfPages. Do not ever skip googleSearchesOnSpecificSites, otherwise you will fail to accomplish your task. Also, it is important to keep search queries as short as possible
